backend/main.mo: Main canister actor managing rooms, devices, users, access control initialization, and per‑user default provisioning.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding nextDeviceId to existing persisted state by extending the old actor model.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind OKLCH color system and dark mode variables with base styling and CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting dark mode, app root, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation, security gating, auto‑provisioning, and view rendering including 3D mode.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LiveSt: Dashboard section computing device/room statistics and displaying energy, health, and activity charts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/widget: Renders a pie chart with calculated SVG slice paths and a legend, with an empty state for zero devices.
Draws an energy consumption line and area chart using calculated SVG path data and highlights max values.
Displays a circular gauge indicating home health percentage with color-coded progress and labels.
frontend/src/components/effects/GlassCar: Wraps children in a glass-style Card with optional tilt effect and click handling.
frontend/src/components/effects/Tilt.tsx: Applies a 3D tilt animation to its child element based on mouse movement unless reduced-motion is enabled.
Provides the main application layout with a sidebar, header, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Renders a header containing the branded title with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Displays sidebar navigation with view switching, a custom action button, and premium edition footer.
frontend/src/components/rooms/BulkAddDev: Implements a dialog to bulk-create devices with backend ID allocation, error handling, and auto-retry on provisioning.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateDevi: Dialog for creating a device with backend ID allocation, auth error handling, and auto-retry provisioning.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateRoom: Dialog for creating rooms with validation, room ID allocation, auth error handling, and auto-retry provisioning.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomCountS: Simple plus/minus stepper that clamps values within a min/max range.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDashbo: Dashboard showing devices in a room with toggles, brightness controls, stats, and bulk actions.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDevice: Room-scoped device list with toggles, brightness control, and dialogs for adding devices with auto‑refetch.
Clickable room card displaying room info with settings and add‑device controls.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomsEditM: Fullscreen overlay for bulk editing room names, allowing selection and renaming of individual rooms.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomSettin: Modal dialog for editing a room's name, color, and hidden status with validation, error handling, and auto-retry provisioning support.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomsListS: Skeleton placeholder layout for the rooms list page to mimic final structure during loading.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomTile.t: Tile UI for displaying a room with inline editing of name and color and backend update calls.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomUsageS: Loads devices for a room and shows usage stats including counts and an activity pie chart with loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/security/AccessI: Alert component for authorization or provisioning failures with a retry action.
frontend/src/components/security/Provisi: Glass-styled status card showing provisioning states with optional retry functionality.
frontend/src/components/security/QRScann: Dialog that manages camera-based QR scanning, auto-start behavior, scan success handling, and fallbacks for unsupported browsers.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Bas: Thin wrapper component that renders the RealisticHomeModel for compatibility with previous imports.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/con: Defines a transparent screen area for mobile touch-drag camera rotation, excluding the joystick region. Uses useTouchLook to emit rotation updates.
Hook providing pointer-lock mouse-look rotation, handling lock events and sensitivity. Returns clamped pitch and continuous yaw updates.
Hook tracking touch-drag gestures to produce yaw and pitch values for mobile camera control. Supports enabling/disabling and clamps pitch.
Hook capturing WASD keyboard input, returning active directional states. Resets inputs when disabled.
Implements an on-screen joystick with deadzone smoothing for controlling movement. Handles touch and mouse input and resets when disabled.
Combines WASD, mouse-look, joystick, and touch-look navigation with teleportation and per-room movement bounds. Updates camera position and rotation each frame.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/dev: Defines static 3D positions for known devices and utilities to look up, check, and filter devices with mapped positions.
Light device dialog with power toggle, brightness control, and auth error handling.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/hot: 3D clickable hotspot orb with hover effects, floating animation, and event-stop behavior.
Places interactive device hotspots at mapped positions and triggers device selection.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/lig: Renders 3D bulb fixtures that glow based on device on/off state and brightness.
Sets up ambient, directional, and device-driven point lights for the 3D scene.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/map: Defines static 2D floorplan regions with geometry and zoom transforms for each room.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Rea: Three.js scene defining a detailed 3D home interior with walls, floor, ceiling, molding, and furniture using mesh geometries and materials.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/roo: Specifies per-room camera movement bounds after teleportation.
Provides predefined spawn positions and rotations for room teleporting.
Maps canvas clicks to room IDs based on camera position unless disabled.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Roo: Dialog listing rooms and allowing users to select one for teleportation in 3D mode.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Sma: Sidebar showing room device status with master on/off controls, loading and error states, and data fetched via room-specific queries.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Vir: Interactive 2D floorplan with zoomable room regions, click-to-select behavior, and motion-aware transitions.
Error boundary that catches rendering failures in the 3D scene and reports them upward.
UI toggle for switching between the 2D map and 3D walkthrough modes.

Renders the full 3D home scene, wiring lighting, interior, device hotspots, room selection, navigation, and device dialogs. Manages device selection, joystick and touch look state, and teleport handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
Auto-provisions authenticated users once per actor session and exposes provisioning state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomSidebarActio: Stores and updates a customizable sidebar action using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth client, identity loading, login flow, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: React hook that tracks the user's prefers-reduced-motion media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, rooms, devices, and related backend data with timeout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecurityGateway.ts: Context provider managing a secret key lock system with validation, unlock, and persistence in storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebGLSupport.ts: React hook that checks browser WebGL support and reports availability or error.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, components, and visual effects like glass surfaces and tilt containers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function merging Tailwind and clsx class names into a single string.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying room and device statistics with 3D navigation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDetailsPage.tsx: Room details view showing room info, devices, and error handling with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Renders the rooms dashboard with display count, hidden-room toggling, optimistic room placeholders, and provisioning-aware fetching.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityGatewayPage.t: Provides secret-key input and QR scanning to unlock the app via the security gateway, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays appearance settings, secret key visibility/copying, and configuration for a custom sidebar action.
frontend/src/pages/SupportInfoPage.tsx: Shows knowledge base search and a support ticket form with client-side validation and ticket submission.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualHome3DPage.tsx: Manages the 2D/3D virtual home view, room selection, WebGL checks, error boundaries, and full-screen navigation.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Classifies authorization-related errors and returns user-friendly messages with guidance on provisioning retries.
frontend/src/utils/backendAvailability.t: Sanitizes backend errors to user-friendly messages and detects canister-unavailable or network conditions.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Provides a helper that wraps a promise with a timeout and rejects with a custom error if it takes too long.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params and cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, layout, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, known issues, and feature requirements for fixing room loading and device management.
